pages.text: $(italic)You almost lost your head yourself while searching for a wither skeleton with a spine loose enough to drop it's skull. Heads up, you never were the one to bury your head in the sand. As if struck by lightning you thought out a new enchantment that will be head and shoulders above Sharpness in regards to that endeavour.
$(br3)Occasionally drops mob heads on kill$(br2)Max Level: 3$(br)Applicable to melee weapons.$(br)Mutually exclusive with Looting.
